verses.verse: Then He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> on your <S%H7272>feet<s%> that I may <S%H1696>speak<s%> with you!"
And as He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> me and <S%H5975>set<s%> me on my <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> [Him] <S%H1696>speaking<s%> to me.

Then He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> I am <S%H7971>sending<s%> you to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to a <S%H4775>rebellious<s%> <S%H1471>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against Me; they and their fathers have <S%H1>transgressed<s%> against Me to <S%H6586>this<s%> <S%H2088>very<s%> <S%H6106>day.<s%>

"And I am <S%H7971>sending<s%> you to them who are <S%H7186>stubborn<s%> <S%H6440><s%> and <S%H2389>obstinate<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H1121>children;<s%> and you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>'

"As for them, <S%H518>whether<s%> they <S%H8085>listen<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> not – for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> – they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> has <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

"And you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> them <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> their <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H5621>thistles<s%> and <S%H5544>thorns<s%> are with you and you <S%H3427>sit<s%> on <S%H6137>scorpions;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> their <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at their <S%H6440>presence,<s%> for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
"But you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> My <S%H1697>words<s%> to them <S%H518>whether<s%> they <S%H8085>listen<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> not, for they are <S%H4805>rebellious.<s%>

"Now you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H834>what<s%> I am <S%H1696>speaking<s%> to you; do not be <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> like that <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%> <S%H6475>Open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I am <S%H5414>giving<s%> you."
Then I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H7971>extended<s%> to me; and <S%H2009>lo,<s%> a <S%H4039>scroll<s%> <S%H5612><s%> [was] in it.

When He <S%H6566>spread<s%> it out <S%H6440>before<s%> me, it was <S%H3789>written<s%> on the <S%H6440>front<s%> and <S%H268>back;<s%> and <S%H3789>written<s%> on it were <S%H7015>lamentations,<s%> <S%H1899>mourning<s%> and <S%H1958>woe.<s%>
